sentence.Network_en: I couldn't entrust my children to strangers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不能把孩子交给陌生人照看.

sentence.Network_en: He was forced to entrust an assistant with the important task of testing and demonstrating aircraft to prospective customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不得不将向潜在客户测试和展示飞行器的重任交托给一名助手。

sentence.Network_en: If parents wanted to entrust their child to the best surgeons, they traveled to Bologna's medical school.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果父母们想给孩子看最好的外科医生，他们会前往博洛尼亚的医学院。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 属字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 使聚集在一起;集合〖 gather〗 通“嘱”。托付;委托〖 entrust〗 叮嘱;告诫。后作“嘱”〖 enjoin〗.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... enclose 围入，关进 entrust 信托，委托 enfold 包入.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... entreaty 恳求 entrust 托付 entry 进口.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... entrench 挖壕沟以保护,确立 entrust 交托 envelop 包围,围绕.

list.abs: 法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 委托代理 agency 委托代理人 entrusted agent 委托律师 mandatory lawyer.
check)，遗产委托(heritage entrustment)，有的银行还经营金融市场(financial  market)、证券交易所(stock exchange)，用信用卡结算 …
违反合同breach of contract委托代理：entrusted agency委托代理人：an entrusted agent
银行常用英语词汇（三）_无门慧Michelle_新浪博客 ... 银团贷款 syndicated loan 委托贷款 entrusted loan 票据贴现 bill discount.

entry.def: If you entrust something important to someone or entrust them with it, you make them responsible for looking after it or dealing with it.

example.ex: If parents wanted to entrust their child to the best surgeons, they traveled to Bologna's medical school...
example.tran: 如果父母们想给孩子看最好的外科医生，他们会前往博洛尼亚的医学院。

example.ex: He was forced to entrust an assistant with the important task of testing and demonstrating aircraft to prospective customers...
example.tran: 他不得不将向潜在客户测试和展示飞行器的重任交托给一名助手。

sentences.sentence: "The messenger was entrusted with the general's secret"

means.word_mean: 2. put into the care or protection of someone;

sentences.sentence: "He left the decision to his deputy"

auth_sentence.content: He was going to entrust him with what amounted to his life.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was going to entrust him with what amounted to his life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was going to entrust him with what amounted to his life.

auth_sentence.content: My guess is they would not entrust the internet to private commerce.
auth_sentence.res_content: My guess is they would not entrust the internet to private commerce.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My guess is they would not entrust the internet to private commerce.

auth_sentence.content: How could we entrust this dreary man with the next generation's aspirations?
auth_sentence.res_content: How could we entrust this dreary man with the next generation's aspirations?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How could we entrust this dreary man with the next generation's aspirations?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托

sentences.en: He entrusted me with his money.
You have no right to play ducks and drakes with money that has been entrusted to you.
sentences.cn: 你没权挥霍委托你保管的钱。

means.word_mean: 委托某人做某事(或照看某人)

sentences.en: I couldn’t entrust my children to strangers.
sentences.cn: 我不能把孩子交给陌生人照看。

sentences.en: Can you entrust an assistant with the task?
sentences.cn: 你能把这项工作交给助手吗？
